subject: feat: add multi-repo management with config and update script
body:
- Created config/repos.json to track repository URLs
- Created scripts/update-all.sh to automate extraction/aggregation
- Updated ADMIN_GUIDE.md with managed repos workflow
- Simplified .gitignore: track all reports/, ignore .repo-cache/
- Updated SESSION_NOTES.md and HISTORY.md

Repos can now be added to config once and re-extracted anytime
by running: ./scripts/update-all.sh
